   2  getHeader();

   5  ?>

   9  <td width="5%" align="left"><?php displayLogOutButton(); ?></td></tr>
  10  </table>
  11  <?php
  12  
  13  echo "<br>";
  14  displayHeadText(getExperimentName($_GET['sim']));
  15  $contentDetails=getAllContentItems($_GET['sim']);
  16  $arrContentItem=array();
  17  $arrContentLink=array();
  18  $arrContentImage=array();
  19  //
  20  for($i=0;$i<count($contentDetails);$i++)
  21  {
  22      $arrContentItem[$i]=$contentDetails[$i][1];
  23      if(getExperimentItemName($_GET['cnt'])==$arrContentItem[$i])
  24      {
  25          $currentItem=$i;
  26      }
  27      $arrContentLink[$i]=$simLink."&cnt=".$contentDetails[$i][0];
  28      $arrContentImage[$i]=getMenuIcons('content_'.$contentDetails[$i][0]);
  29  }
  30  //
  31  $contentDetails=getContentIdAndStatus($_GET['cnt'], $_GET['sim']);
  32  $externalType=$contentDetails[0][1];
  33  $externalLink="";
  34  if($_GET['cnt']==SIMULATOR_ID and getExperimentTypeId($_GET['sim'])==REMOTETRIGGER_ID)
  35  {
  36      include ('remote_trigger_include.php');
  37  }    
  38  else
  39  {
  40      if($contentDetails[0][1]=='Y')//external status
  41      {
  42          $externalLink=getContentLink($contentDetails[0][0]);
  43      }
  44      else
  45      {
  46      //
  47      $contentText=htmlspecialchars_decode(getContentDescription($contentDetails[0][0]));
  48      }
  49  }    
  50  //
  51  //
  52  displayTabEnvironment($arrContentItem,$arrContentLink,$arrContentImage,$currentItem,$contentText,$externalLink);
  53  //
  54  echo "</div>";
  55  getFooter();
  56  ?>
